column_description: System generated unique ID of the project.
Boolean representing whether the project has been archived (removed from asana UI).
Color of the project as seen in the UI.
Timestamp of when the story was made/the action was logged.
The most recent progress status update for the project. This is sent to all project followers.
The date the project is due.
The last time the project was updated. Does not include comments nor changes in associations (ie new tasks).
The given name of the project.
Free-form textual notes associated with the project.
Foreign key referencing the USER who owns the project.
Boolean that is true if the project is public to the whole organization, false if not.
Foreign key referencing the TEAM that the project is shared with.
The id of an organization's workspace in asana. Not necessary unless you have access to multiple asana workspaces.
